name: progress-bar
author: Ashish-Pandey62
preview: A stylish animated progress bar component with customizable colors, sizes, and smooth animations for modern web applications.

props.name: value
props.description: Progress value between 0 and 100 for determinate mode (default: 0)

props.name: indeterminate
props.description: Whether to show indeterminate loading animation (default: false)

props.name: showLabel
props.description: Whether to display the percentage label (default: false)

props.name: animated
props.description: Whether to animate the progress fill (default: true)
